tr.td: Intensive Care Unit Venous Thromboembolism Prophylaxis

externalDocument.text: Intensive Care Unit Venous Thromboembolism Prophylaxis

tr.td: Device, Applied: Graduated compression stockings (GCS) - Compression hosiery class II thigh length stocking circular knit standard stock size (physical object)
Intervention, Performed: Palliative Care - palliative care (regime/therapy)
Procedure, Performed: General or Neuraxial Anesthesia - Anesthesia for radical surgery on nose (procedure)
Diagnosis, Active: Obstetrics - Spontaneous abortion in third trimester (disorder)
Patient Characteristic Clinical Trial Participant: Clinical Trial Participant - Clinical Trial Participant (person)
Device, Applied: Intermittent pneumatic compression devices (IPC) - intermittent pneumatic compression stockings (physical object)
Medication, Administered: Factor Xa Inhibitor - 0.8 ML Fondaparinux sodium 12.5 MG/ML Prefilled Syringe
Intervention, Order: Palliative Care - palliative care (regime/therapy)
Encounter, Performed: Inpatient Encounter - hospital admission, short-term, 24 hours (procedure)
Encounter, Performed: Emergency Department Visit - Emergency Department visit (procedure)
Procedure, Performed: Intracranial Neurosurgery - Other craniotomy
Medication, Administered: Unfractionated Heparin - Heparin sodium 20000 UNT/ML Injectable Solution
Patient Characteristic Payer: Payer - Foreign Fee/Foreign Medical Program(FMP)
Procedure, Performed: Knee Replacement Surgery - Supplement Right Knee Joint, Tibial Surface with Liner, Open Approach
Risk Category Assessment: VTE Risk Assessment -
Procedure, Performed: General Surgery - Total splenectomy
Procedure, Performed: Hip Fracture Surgery - Secondary arthroplasty of hip for correction of congenital deformity (procedure)
Procedure, Performed: Urological Surgery - Closure of vesicocervicovaginal fistula (procedure)
Procedure, Performed: Gynecological Surgery - Vaginal hysterectomy with colpo-urethrocystopexy, Marshall-Marchetti-Krantz type (procedure)
Procedure, Performed: Hip Replacement Surgery - Resurfacing hip, total, acetabulum and femoral head
Diagnosis, Active: Obstetrics VTE - obstetric blood-clot pulmonary embolism with postnatal complication (disorder)
Medication, Administered: Warfarin - Warfarin Sodium 2.5 MG Oral Tablet
Device, Applied: Venous foot pumps (VFP) - venous foot pump, device (physical object)
Diagnosis, Active: Venous Thromboembolism - Thrombophlebitis of the popliteal vein (disorder)
Encounter, Performed: ICU Admission or Transfer - Patient transfer to intensive care unit (procedure)
Medication, Administered: Low Molecular Weight Heparin - 0.6 ML Enoxaparin sodium 100 MG/ML Prefilled Syringe
Medication, Administered: Anticoagulant Therapy - 0.3 ML Dalteparin Sodium 25000 UNT/ML Prefilled Syringe
